item.title: Apple Sues the YouTuber Who Leaked iOS 26
item.description: In a lawsuit filed against prominent leaker Jon Prosser, Apple alleges a conspiracy to break into a development device and steal its trade secrets. Prosser insists Apple has it all wrong.
